name: Indian Doll Wedding Girl Salon
description:
Let’s play amazing Indian Doll Wedding Girl Salon Game. Traditional Indian culture is hot favourite amongst all countries. So Get ready for this country theme makeover! Help this bridal girl for her marriage. Its' amazing game for kids and adult also. At the beginning of game start to so many different levels.

At the the start of the game Bridal wan’t to all the treatment which is available on beauty parlour. So this game is very interesting with all levels. You need to one bye one levels completed and help to broom.

In this game there are different levels like Lag wax, hand wash, lagspa, haldi, gajara, car decoration, haldi mix, hand mehandi, lag mahandi, makeup, man dress up, car decoration, body spa, and many more which is available on beauty parlour.

After play this game your improvement on parlour practise also.

Features:
========
- HD beautiful graphics with Indian Doll Character.
- Easy to play and apply all tools.
- Number of glamorous makeup options!
- Attractive ornaments like bangles, necklaces, earrings, nose rings etc.
- Colorful Indian Traditional Design.
- There are 12+ different levels.
- Sliding color is help to change color of cloths and more items.
- So many tools help to make bridal look very beautiful,
- Supported IOS11.
- Easy user interface.

So are you excited for play this game? Download Now….
